text: what is the best way to run a MCMC simulation?

elements.text: what is the best way to run a MCMC simulation?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
i am wondering if there is a module that can help me get started with a monte carlo simuation?

elements.text: i am wondering if there is a module that can help me get started with a monte carlo simuation?

text:
you’ll have to be more specific - there’s a bunch of MCMC packages in Julia, though I imagine they’re somewhat specific to the developers usage.

for example, the first few results on google
• <https://turing.ml/dev/docs/using-turing/guide>, <https://github.com/TuringLang/MCMCChains.jl> 
• <https://github.com/JuliaStats/Klara.jl>
• <https://mambajl.readthedocs.io/en/latest/>
